comment_data.body: the lsp log file is mentioned in `:checkhealth`, please look for hints there and post the relevant logs
No logs are generated from this example, just ones relating to a previous mistake I made configuring wgsl_anaylzer. After deleting the log file, it remains clean

milestone.description: We don't plan to work on this, but will accept high quality contributions from someone who will own the feature and follow up on bug reports.
milestone.title: needs-owner

title: LSP: Cannot get codelens from rust analyzer
